name: Vamoose! - A Jungle Escape
description:
Amazing endless running 3d adventure!
Its up to you to survive this crazy jungle escape! Jump over and slide under obstacles, shoot obstacles in your way with blades and run on walls like a ninja! Its a race that requires nerves of steel that only the King/Queen of the jungle can possess! Can you survive this escape? Enjoy the 3D jungle action as you run for your life! Become the jungle super hero! Collect enough stars to upgrade your character and obtain power-ups to make the journey easier and more exciting! Good luck and keep running!

Game Features:

- Choose from 4 characters (2 males, 2 females)
- Collect/buy coins to upgrade characters with super cool power-ups!
- Shoot obstacles that are in your way with ninja stars!
- Easy controls, just swipe and tap!
- Run and jump off walls like a boss!
- Challenge friends in Game Center!
